[ Trusted by Leading Life Sciences Companies Worldwide ]

About GoVal

We are pioneering the future of digital validation for life sciences organizations. Our mission is to transform complex validation processes into streamlined, compliant, and intelligent workflows that accelerate time-to-market while ensuring the highest standards of quality and regulatory compliance.

500+
Projects Delivered
50+
Countries Served
99.9%
Compliance Rate

Our Mission

To revolutionize validation processes in life sciences through intelligent digital solutions that ensure compliance, accelerate time-to-market, and drive operational excellence. We believe that validation should be an enabler, not a barrier, to bringing life-saving therapies to market.

Our Vision

To be the global standard for digital validation solutions, enabling life sciences organizations worldwide to bring innovative therapies to market faster while maintaining the highest standards of quality, safety, and regulatory compliance.

Our Story

Founded by validation experts who understood the challenges facing life sciences organizations in the digital age.

2018

The Beginning

GoVal was born from a simple observation: validation processes in life sciences were stuck in the past. Despite tremendous advances in technology, organizations were still relying on paper-based systems, manual processes, and disconnected tools that created bottlenecks and compliance risks.

2019

First Platform Launch

Our founding team, comprised of validation experts, regulatory professionals, and technology innovators, came together with a shared vision: to create the first truly intelligent validation platform designed specifically for the unique challenges of pharmaceutical, biotech, and medical device companies.

2021

AI Integration

Introduced GoVal AI, incorporating machine learning and artificial intelligence to automate risk assessments, generate test cases, and predict validation timelines with unprecedented accuracy.

2024

Global Expansion

Today, GoVal serves leading organizations across the globe, helping them navigate complex regulatory requirements while accelerating their journey from lab to market. Our AI-powered platform has processed thousands of validation projects, ensuring compliance while reducing validation timelines by up to 80%.

What We Do

Comprehensive digital validation solutions tailored for the life sciences industry.

Digital Validation Platform

Complete paperless validation lifecycle management from GxP assessment to final documentation, ensuring 100% compliance and audit readiness.

GxP Assessment Risk Management E-Signatures

Leverage artificial intelligence to automate risk assessments, generate test cases, and predict validation timelines with 95% accuracy.

Smart Risk Assessment Auto Test Generation Predictive Analytics

CFR Part 11 EU Annex 11 Global Standards

Industries We Serve

Specialized solutions for diverse life sciences sectors with unique validation requirements.

Pharmaceutical

Drug development, manufacturing, and quality systems validation for pharmaceutical companies worldwide.

  • Drug Manufacturing Systems
  • Quality Management Systems
  • Clinical Trial Systems
  • Regulatory Submission Systems

Biotechnology

Biomanufacturing, cell and gene therapy, and research systems validation for biotech organizations.

  • Biomanufacturing Systems
  • Cell & Gene Therapy
  • Research & Development
  • Laboratory Information Systems

Medical Devices

Device manufacturing, quality systems, and regulatory compliance validation for medical device companies.

  • Device Manufacturing
  • ISO 13485 Systems
  • Risk Management
  • Post-Market Surveillance

CRO & CMO

Contract research and manufacturing organizations requiring flexible, scalable validation solutions.

  • Clinical Research Systems
  • Manufacturing Services
  • Client Project Management
  • Multi-tenant Architectures

Why Choose GoVal?

The clear choice for organizations serious about digital transformation and regulatory excellence.

Proven Results

Over 500 successful validation projects with an average 75% reduction in validation timelines and 99.9% compliance success rate.

Enterprise Security

SOC 2 Type II certified platform with end-to-end encryption, role-based access controls, and comprehensive audit trails.

Global Compliance

Built-in compliance with FDA CFR Part 11, EU Annex 11, and other global regulatory requirements across 50+ countries.

Expert Support

Dedicated support from validation experts with SLA-based response times and comprehensive training programs.

Scalable Platform

Flexible architecture that grows with your organization, from small teams to global enterprises with thousands of users.

Continuous Innovation

Regular platform updates, new features, and AI enhancements to keep you at the forefront of validation technology.
